A

absent() - Static method in class software.leonov.maybe.Maybe
Returns a Maybe instance which contains no value.

filter(Predicate<? super T>) - Method in class software.leonov.maybe.Maybe

M

Returns a Maybe instance which contains the result of applying the given Function to the current value if it is present or an absent instance otherwise.
